page.title: 11RECREATION cont.
page.content: {High low Dolly Pepper "High,low,Dolly,Pepper, High,low,Dolly,Pepper, High,low,Dolly,Pepper, High,low,Dolly,Pepper........" This goes on until the person skipping misses,if she stops on high she has to stand while skipping,and if she stops on low she has to skip on her hunkers.But if she stops on Dolly she hops while skipping and if she stops on Pepper she has to keep turning round while skipping. { {Counting Rhyme {Catch A Tiger Eeny,meeny,miny,mo, Catch a tiger by the toe, If he squeals let him go, Eeny,meeny,miny,mo, Out goes Y.O.U. These are some of the skipping rhymes popular in the area we have studied.
